title: Rigveda Samhita
description: "The edition of the Rigveda by Prof. R. L. Kashyap and Prof. S. Sadagopan published in 1998 by the Sri Aurobindo Kapali Sastry Institute of Vedic Culture is a masterpiece of meticulousness and a gem of Indian Devanagari typography." ~ Sri Aurobindo Kapali Sastry Institute of Vedic Culture
author: R.L. Kashyap
